physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neurologic examination was normal; patient denied any current or previous neurologic symptoms.
MRI showed a parietal dural-based mass, consistent with meningioma; neurologic examination was normal.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: MRI 6 months later showed appearance of diffuse pachymeningeal enhancement; MRIs at 6 and 12 months later showed gradual resolution of the pachymeningeal enhancement.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: MRI showed diffuse pachymeningeal enhancement and sagging of the brain; neurologic examination was normal.
